=== Welcome! ===
<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/Icongnomeicu3.png]]</nowiki> This is the home page for the '''Florida Ubuntu Local Community (LoCo) Team'''. Started in February, 2007, the Florida Team has already grown to over 280 members.  In accordance with the Ubuntu philosophy, this team is open and available to anybody.  Our members range from DJs to System Administrators.  If you'd like to contribute to Ubuntu and Linux, we encourage you to <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-florida/+join | join the team]]</nowiki>.  No previous knowledge or experience is necessary.  

If you are not quite ready to join the team, and are just looking for some help, come check out our LoCo team support options.

=== Our Goals ===
* Educate the Florida public about the use of Ubuntu, Linux, and Open Source.
* Provide an avenue for those wishing to contribute to Ubuntu.
* Assist local Linux User Groups and Free/Libre Open Source Software initiatives.
* Assist with <nowiki>[[http://freegeekcentralflorida.blogspot.com/ | Free Geek Central Florida]]</nowiki> and other similar technology-oriented social groups.
* Introduce Ubuntu to people at business and social events
* Develop a 20-30 word press statement about our LoCo.
* Focus on promoting Ubuntu to people with a non-technical background  

=== IMPORTANT ===
